RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 1 870 Y Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Purse 10500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JONO dueled, prevailed. JUSTIN SPEIGHT dueled, outkicked. EZ GUESS inside turn, late effort. LAUNCHED pressed issue, outfinished. CHERUBIM chased, 2w turn, evenly. BAKERSFIELD BABE 4wturn, lost crop top stretch. PRIMEROINDIOAZOOM 3w turn, dropped back.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 2 7F Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 6400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME OR COLORADO BRED NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: POPS GIRL ALEXA trailed the field through the turn while saving ground then tipped out to three wide at the eighth pole to make a rally and drew clear. RETRO RITA went to the front to a clear lead to quarter pole then fought gamely to mid stretch, weakened and was outfinished. EXODUS AND HOPE chased the leaders down the backstretch then moved between horses at the five sixteenths pole and engaged the leader but was empty in the stretch. IMA HOT TOTTIE prompted the pace from two wide to the five sixteenths and tired in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Exodus and Hope
ENTRY.OWNER: Haar Robert J and Hitt Joshua James
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leaders, between 5/16, engaged leader, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Pops Girl Alexa
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, saved ground turn, 3w1/8, rallied, drew clear,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 6600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME OR COLORADO BRED NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DIVINE TASK went to a clear lead to the turn then was challenged in mid turn but dug in and pulled away, floated out going into the stretch but kept on and drew off. AUTISM WARRIOR trailed the field to the turn then saved ground around the turn and made a late run to be second best. EUSEBIO was off the pace and made a mild bid in mid turn but weakened. ROUGE SUNSET stalked the pace from three wide to mid turn and dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: Divine Task
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear lead, challenged, pulled away, float out, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Autism Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, saved ground turn, late run, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Eusebio
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, mild bid turn, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 6600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME OR COLORADO BRED NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EXTRA SAUCE went to the front to an unchallenged lead and was kept to task in the stretch. STOLEN HALO was off the pace on the inside but lacked room nearing the quarter pole and had to steady slightly but proved second best. ANGIE'S REVRAC chased the leader from three wide through the turn and made a late run to be up for the show. MANDONA prompted the pace from two wide to the quarter pole and tired. CRIMSON T. trailed the field by several lengths through the turn and showed late interest in the stretch. A JOCKEY OBJECTION WAS POSTED, THE JOCKEY OF STOLEN HALO CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST EXTRA SAUCE FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE NEAR THE QUARTER POLE, AFTER A STEWARDS REVIEW NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Stolen Halo
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, inside, lacked room 1/4, steadied slightly, second best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 6800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF A RACE IN 2023 OR NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RHODIUM RUNNER stalked the pace from the inside to the turn then started to tip out at the five sixteenths pole, went three wide in upper stretch to make a rally and prevailed. WEBCAM pressed the pace from the two then took a narrow lead at the five sixteenths pole, dueled to deep stretch and was outfinished by outside closer. CLEARLY MAD sprinted away to a pressured lead from the inside to the five sixteenths and matched strides to deep stretch while fighting gamley. MUCHO GIFTED was forwardly placed in the two path to the turn then fell back, moved out to four wide in upper stretch but didn't make a bid. NO LIMITATION trailed the field and was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Rhodium Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, tipped out 5/16, 3wupper, rallied, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Clearly Mad
ENTRY.OWNER: Rushton Stacey Eskew Stuart and Alfrey Vance

ENTRY.NAME: Mucho Gifted
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, fell back turn, 4wupper, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Webcam
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, narrow lead, stretch duel, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME OR COLORADO BRED NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; , 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAJUN FIRE sprinted to the lead from the inside then was engaged at the three furlong marker, matched strides with outside rival to deep stretch and drew clear. CRYSTAL BANDIT was off the pace early then moved between horses at the seven sixteenths pole, vied for the lead from the two path then dueled to deep stretch and tired. ROCKYMOUNTAINTWIST chased the leaders through the turn and made a mild late gain in the stretch. GUEST CHECK trailed the field through the turn and passed tired one in the stretch. BEE EXXTRAVAGANT vied for the lead from three wide to the turn then fell back, drifted out in the stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprint to lead, engaged 3/8, dueled, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Crystal Bandit
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, between 7/16, vied 2p, dueled, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Bee Exxtravagant
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3w, fell back turn, drift out stretch, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 14500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF A RACE IN 2023 0R NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOVELY LOLA raced close up on the pace then made a rail bid on the turn to take the lead at the quarter pole and drew off. WHISTLING HOME shared the command to the seven sixteenths pole and fought gamely to the eighth pole then pulled away to be second best. COCKTAIL SLIPPERS shared the command to the seven sixteenths and fought gamely to the eighth pole but weakened. QUEENS RANSOM trailed the field to top of the stretch and moved between at the eighth pole to improve position. PRINCESS JAYLEEN was forwardly placed from the three path, made a mild bid into the stretch but faltered. GRACIE'S A TIGER vied for the lead from four wide to the seven sixteenths pole and dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: Lovely Lola
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, rail bid turn, led 1/4, drew off,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Glencrest Farm, LLC, Greathouse Equine,LLC & Fox Straus KY

ENTRY.NAME: Gracie's a Tiger
ENTRY.OWNER: Hickey Wendy Luedtke Walter and Martinez Jr O A

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 85. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 6200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $2500 OR LESS IN 2022-2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $3500 OR COLORADO BRED CLAIMING PRICE $5000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $3,500. Colorado Bred Claiming Pr ice $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JIMBO'S BIZ was off the pace then made two wide bid at the three furlong marker, moved out to three wide at the quarter pole to run down the leader and drew clear late. TIGER BY HIS TAIL sprinted to the lead then inched away at the quarter pole but was caught late. TOMBI saved ground through the turn then angled out to two wide to rally and be up for the show. CHEF was forwardly placed from three wide to the top of the stretch, moved in to the inside rail but tired. PERVASIVE rushed up from three wide down the backstretch then tipped out to four wide around the turn and flattened out. HOT ARTIE vied for the lead from two wide to the five sixteenths pole and retreated. MCORO trailed the field, jogged in, vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Jimbo's Biz
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, bid 3/8, 3w1/4, ran down leader, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: McOro
ENTRY.OWNER: Rust Terri and Barton Ranch Stables LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Tiger by His Tail
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprint to lead, inch away 1/4, caught late
